text: To allaha hoya, jyane tumacyasathi jaminila rahanyace thikana ani akasala chata banavile ani tumhala rupa dile ani khupa cangale banavile ani tumhala khupa cangalya cangalya vastu khanyasathi dilyata. Toca allaha tumaca palanakarta ahe. Tevha motha subha ahe allaha, jo samasta visvanca svami va palanakarta ahe
